description: Evolution Payload Schema Definition (EPSD): Defines the mandatory structure, constraints, and validation requirements for M-02 Mutation Payloads.

payload_hash_sha256.description: Cryptographic hash of the payload body.

target_module_identifier.description: Unique identifier of the module targeted for mutation.

source_intent_id.description: Traceable identifier linking the payload to the original source intent.

estimated_cpu_cycles_stage3_max.description: Maximum permitted computational cycles for the evolutionary stage 3.

estimated_memory_kb_max.description: Maximum permitted memory usage (64MB) during execution.
